post.body: Pres. Jimmy Carter is/was often accused of not being enough of a supporter (and much worse).
thanks for ReTweets! A welcome reminder that these actually go somewhere! :)
Blog is looking great!!
Why mind loss? Say hi to kinision!
ACK! UnionStn would have been better! Oh well. Had no idea twitter would not redirect! That is lame. Bad Twitter!
@passitalong made the change after realizing full @UnionStayshyn took up valuable character space! :)
LOL! That's hilarious. Now I love that scene even more! http://bit.ly/bi70
Watched again http://tinyurl.com/822pj8 there's an unused lamp in the scene! Does it represent her lack of 'electric' sex?
I <3 the scene when the Leader of the Nuns tells Maria to get the hell out and go get laid! Her office needs better lighting!
WH Press Conf. G Johndroe: Q: What will Pres. Bush do today? A: "Paperwork. Ride his bike."
WH Press Conf. G Johndroe. Q: Connection between #Gaza timing and upcoming election? A:"No. It's just self-defence" Salad bar's open 'til 7!
Funny: RT @AdamSchwabe: laughing, a lot at @astroboy taking a self-proclaimed SEO expert to school, all-caps style.
Islamophobia rears head: RT @rfburnhertz: Islam rejects natural law, it is easy 4 them then to hate those unlike them and make war with them
Gaza action comes just before Israeli election. Reminded of numerous 'Terrorist Alerts' in lead up to the 2004 Bush/Kerry US election.
UPDATE: Bush strengthens his legacy, retools 'Roadmap 4 Peace' for diff. conflict: @PopeyesChicken vs. @officialpeta (sorry, needed lulz)
Unfortunate metaphor: Hamas = crazy ex-wife http://tinyurl.com/8jt224 Extend this to the recent Gaza action & sequel would be... um... NSFW.
New Twitter account @AJGaza "The latest news from Al Jazeera English on the violence in Gaza"
Hatred taught on both sides. Vid implies all Palestinians = terrorists: http://tinyurl.com/9k9r2t (note birthrate stat at the end - huh?).
A Calgary police constable uses his WORK EMAILto promote his book in a SPAM comment on the Maclean's blog http://tinyurl.com/72ckrs
Watching 'The Bush Years' on Newsworld - still find the lying/failing/bullying pretty shocking. "All the hawks were NOT veterans"
